summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for a specific account over the month of June 2018. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting significant outgoing transfers and the ending balance at the end of the month.

persons.name: Stewart O'Field
persons.context: Stewart O'Field is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfers
events.description: Multiple outgoing money transfers were made from the account, including a transfer of $1,000,000 to Harlequin Dane LLC and $500,000 to Coxive Enterprises LLC.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer
events.description: An incoming money transfer of $30,600 was credited to the account from Harlequin Dane LLC.

events.title: Cash Management Transfers
events.description: A cash management transfer of $9,000,000 was made into and out of the account.

events.title: Check Payment
events.description: A check payment of $300 was processed on June 29, 2018.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $396,015.00 on June 1, 2018.
The account experienced significant outgoing transfers totaling $10,500,000.00 during June 2018.
The ending balance of the account as of June 30, 2018, was $810,530,600.00.
Stewart O'Field is the contact person for inquiries regarding the account.
There are multiple references to transactions involving Harlequin Dane LLC and Coxive Enterprises LLC.
